verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph.<s%> <S%H389>Truly<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> even to such as are of a <S%H1249>clean<s%> <S%H3824>heart.<s%>
But as for me, my <S%H7272>feet<s%> were <S%H4592>almost<s%> <S%H5186>gone;<s%> my <S%H838>steps<s%> had <S%H369>well<s%> <S%H4592>near<s%> <S%H8210>slipped.<s%>
For I was <S%H7065>envious<s%> at the <S%H1984>foolish,<s%> when I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H7965>prosperity<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
For there are <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2784>bands<s%> in their <S%H4194>death:<s%> but their <S%H193>strength<s%> is <S%H1277>firm.<s%>
They are not in <S%H5999>trouble<s%> as other <S%H582>men;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> are they <S%H5060>plagued<s%> <S%H5973>like<s%> other <S%H120>men.<s%>
Therefore <S%H1346>pride<s%> <S%H6059>compasses<s%> them about as a <S%H6059>chain;<s%> <S%H2555>violence<s%> <S%H5848>covers<s%> them as a <S%H7897>garment.<s%>
Their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H3318>stand<s%> out with <S%H2459>fatness:<s%> they have <S%H5674>more<s%> than <S%H3824>heart<s%> could <S%H4906>wish.<s%>
They are <S%H4167>corrupt,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7451>wickedly<s%> concerning <S%H6233>oppression:<s%> they <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H4791>loftily.<s%>
They <S%H8371>set<s%> their <S%H6310>mouth<s%> against the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1980>walks<s%> through the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H1988>here:<s%> and <S%H4325>waters<s%> of a <S%H4392>full<s%> cup are <S%H4680>wrung<s%> out to them.
And they <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H349>How<s%> does <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H3045>know?<s%> and is there <S%H1844>knowledge<s%> in the <S%H5945>most<s%> <S%H5945>High?<s%>
<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H7563>ungodly,<s%> who <S%H7951>prosper<s%> in the <S%H5769>world;<s%> they <S%H7685>increase<s%> in <S%H2428>riches.<s%>
<S%H389>Truly<s%> I have <S%H2135>cleansed<s%> my <S%H3824>heart<s%> in <S%H7385>vain,<s%> and <S%H7364>washed<s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> in <S%H5356>innocence.<s%>
For <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> long have I <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H5060>plagued,<s%> and <S%H8433>chastened<s%> every <S%H1242>morning.<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> I <S%H559>say,<s%> I will <S%H5608>speak<s%> <S%H3644>thus;<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I should <S%H898>offend<s%> against the <S%H1755>generation<s%> of your <S%H1121>children.<s%>
When I <S%H2803>thought<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> it was too <S%H5999>painful<s%> for me;
<S%H5704>Until<s%> I <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of <S%H410>God;<s%> then <S%H995>understood<s%> I their <S%H319>end.<s%>
<S%H389>Surely<s%> you did <S%H7896>set<s%> them in <S%H2513>slippery<s%> places: you <S%H5307>cast<s%> them <S%H5307>down<s%> into <S%H4876>destruction.<s%>
<S%H349>How<s%> are they brought into <S%H8047>desolation,<s%> as in a <S%H7281>moment!<s%> they are utterly <S%H8552>consumed<s%> with <S%H1091>terrors.<s%>
As a <S%H2472>dream<s%> when one <S%H6974>wakes;<s%> so, O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> when you <S%H5782>wake,<s%> you shall <S%H959>despise<s%> their <S%H6754>image.<s%>
<S%H3588>Thus<s%> my <S%H3824>heart<s%> was <S%H2556>grieved,<s%> and I was <S%H8150>pricked<s%> in my <S%H3629>reins.<s%>
So <S%H1198>foolish<s%> was I, and <S%H3808>ignorant:<s%> <S%H3045><s%> I was as a <S%H929>beast<s%> <S%H5973>before<s%> you.
Nevertheless I am <S%H8548>continually<s%> with you: you have <S%H270>held<s%> me by my <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
You shall <S%H5148>guide<s%> me with your <S%H6098>counsel,<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3947>receive<s%> me to <S%H3519>glory.<s%>
<S%H4310>Whom<s%> have I in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> but you? and there is <S%H3808>none<s%> on <S%H776>earth<s%> that I <S%H2654>desire<s%> <S%H5973>beside<s%> you.
My <S%H7607>flesh<s%> and my <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H3615>fails:<s%> but <S%H430>God<s%> is the <S%H6697>strength<s%> of my <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and my <S%H2506>portion<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
For, <S%H2005>see,<s%> they that are <S%H7369>far<s%> from you shall <S%H6>perish:<s%> you have <S%H6789>destroyed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> them that <S%H935>go<s%> a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> from you.

But it is <S%H2896>good<s%> for me to draw <S%H7132>near<s%> to <S%H430>God:<s%> I have <S%H7896>put<s%> my <S%H4268>trust<s%> in the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> that I may <S%H5608>declare<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4399>works.<s%>
